titleStmt.title: Act against profaness. Edinburgh, the 9. of August 1693.
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.
McLeod, Æneas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied by Wing.
Arms of the city of Edinburgh at head of text.

Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
